name: Boy's Love
description:
Luke and Miharu were childhood friends since forever, they've been together through a lot... With time Luka found himself being more and more interested in his friend, but he could not afford to lose the person he loved more than anything...

Follow the every day life of Luka and Miharu, their discoveries of Miharu's past and their quickly growing feelings towards each other. Would they ever be able to call themselves not only friends? Will they find a peace and happiness together? Will they finally become something they secretly wished each other to be all this time?"Boys' Love" is a visual novel featuring
  • linear & rather short storyline
  • nice background music & sounds
  • Steam achievements
